{{TagLine|AX3600 802.11ax WiFi Router}} :''NEC Aterm BL1000HW - 802.11ax WiFi Router'' :[http://www.aterm.jp/kddi/1000hw/ Product page] {{SupportPage|https://www.au.com/support/service/internet/guide/lan/bl1000/}} {{•}} [https://www.nikkei.com/article/DGXMZO26837970T10C18A2000000/ PR] {{•}} [http://www.aterm.jp/kddi/1000hw/spec.html Spec.] *[[NEC BL1000HW]] - ''AX3600 WiFi Router'' • [https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2018/03/05/qualcomm-kddi-and-nec-platforms-ship-worlds-first-commercially-available PR] • [https://internet.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/news/1105571.html KDDI ISP] :'''CPU:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072 @2.0GHz Quad Core Processor :'''WLAN:''' [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072 (4T4R 2.4GHz + 4T4R 5GHz) :802.11ax: HE80/HE40/HE20, 802.11ac: VHT80/VHT40/VHT20 :'''WAN:''' 1x 10GbE; '''LAN:''' 1x 10GbE + 3x 1GbE; '''USB:''' 2x USB 3.0 :'''Z-Wave:''' 920MHz (922.5/923.9/926.3MHz) - 100kbps :'''VoIP Ports:''' 1× RJ-11 (600Ω) PB/DP -48V :'''Power Supply:''' AC Input : 110V ~ (50/60Hz) :DC Output : 12V with max. 3A current (34W) :'''Dimensions:''' 34mm (W) × 219mm (H) × 205mm (D) :'''Weight:''' 1.0kg ===See also=== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[ASUS GT-AX6000]] *[[Charter RAX1V1K]] *[[Huawei AP7060DN]]
